trans-unit.source: References the method to call when retrieving row data from a provider.
trans-unit.target: 參考提供者擷取資料列資料時要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the connection or transformer must retrieve the row data from the provider.
trans-unit.target: 當 Web 組件控制項實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>介面，並且會作為連接或轉換程式的 Web 組件連接中的提供者必須從提供者擷取資料列資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow>

trans-unit.source: The RowCallback delegate represents the method to call for retrieving the provider data.
trans-unit.target: RowCallback 委派表示要擷取之資料提供者所呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method contains a RowCallback delegate parameter.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A> method is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> class to retrieve row data for transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A>方法用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer>類別和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer>類別來擷取 」 轉換的資料列資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToParametersTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow.GetRowData%2A>
